These rules are sent with the password to the post office so that the guest can prepare. But my friends say all these rules before applying for a membership card. Too bad it embarrassed you. I will pass it on to my bartender friends so that those who speak these rules do not impose themselves too much in order to prevent such situations in the futureüç∏
